alert.note: Alert for Maricopa; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Dust Advisory issued September 11 at 8:39PM MST until September 11 at 9:45PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Dust Advisory for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... Pinal County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 945 PM MST. * At 839 PM MST, a wall of dust was along a line extending from 8 miles southeast of Phoenix International Raceway to South Phoenix to near Salt River Indian Community to Apache Junction, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Less than one mile visibility. SOURCE...Doppler radar. IMPACT...Hazardous travel. * This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 123 and 170. AZ Interstate 17 between mile markers 195 and 223. AZ Route 51 between mile markers 1 and 15. Locations impacted include... Phoenix, Mesa, Chandler, Glendale, Scottsdale, Gilbert, Tempe, Peoria, Surprise, Avondale, Goodyear, Apache Junction, El Mirage, Fountain Hills and Paradise Valley. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Blowing dust brings reduced visibility, leading to dangerous driving conditions. If driving, avoid blowing dust if possible. If caught in dense blowing dust, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
